text:
[Verse]
City lights are glowing
Heartbeats fast and knowing
Midnight streets we're flowing
Everywhere we're going

[Verse 2]
Neon signs a-blazing
Life's a maze amazing
Skyscrapers are gazing
At the world we're chasing

[Chorus]
Oh oh oh city dreams
Oh oh oh bright it seems
In the night sky beams
Oh oh oh chase the gleams

[Verse 3]
People keep on moving
Day by day improving
Every step approving
To the beat we're grooving

[Chorus]
Oh oh oh city dreams
Oh oh oh bright it seems
In the night sky beams
Oh oh oh chase the gleams

[Bridge]
Every shadow whispers
Secrets in the glitter
Stars above us shimmer
City lights won't dimmer
title: City Lights
